Sentencas: In future, a high proportion of electrical energy will be generated from renewable sources.
Titulo: Influence of operating parameters on overall system efficiencies using solid oxide electrolysis technology

Sentencas: One option for using electricity generated from renewable sources, for example from wind power or photovoltaics, is to produce hydrogen by electrolysis.
Titulo: Influence of operating parameters on overall system efficiencies using solid oxide electrolysis technology

Sentencas: Different system configurations and operating conditions were investigated in order to study the efficiencies of producing hydrogen by solid oxide electrolysis.
Titulo: Influence of operating parameters on overall system efficiencies using solid oxide electrolysis technology

Sentencas: Important factors for system efficiencies are the voltage at which the stack is operated, the source of heat for the water evaporation, the pressure level of the hydrogen storage, and the system configuration.
Titulo: Influence of operating parameters on overall system efficiencies using solid oxide electrolysis technology

Sentencas: Based on these factors, four efficiencies were defined taking into account the different conditions and configurations.
Titulo: Influence of operating parameters on overall system efficiencies using solid oxide electrolysis technology

Sentencas: The calculated efficiencies vary from 104% in the best case down to 62% in the worst case, all based on the lower heating value of the hydrogen produced.
Titulo: Influence of operating parameters on overall system efficiencies using solid oxide electrolysis technology
